Text.val: This non-interactive task copies all the chart files to the client, so they will be available to the chart html page
Note that an alternative approach is to have them exposed on the server so the access will be to the server

DisplayList.valUnicode: 1 week,1 month,3 months,6 months, 1 year,[till present]

ExpSyntax.val: 'The date you entered is later than the last order date('&DStr({0,4},'DD/MM/YYYY')&'). The specified period carries no data.'

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select Products.CategoryID,CategoryName, sum (OrderDetails.UnitPrice*OrderDetails.Quantity*(1-OrderDetails.Discount)) as Total from Products,OrderDetails,Orders,Categories where Products.ProductID=OrderDetails.ProductID and Orders.OrderID=OrderDetails.OrderID and Products.CategoryID=Categories.CategoryID and OrderDate>=':1' and OrderDate<=':2' Group by Products.CategoryID,CategoryName order by Products.CategoryID
